name: PI-DENTITY (48K and 128K Version)
description:
Game made 2020

Little PI is sad :-(

He feels so alone, but at the same time connected to everyone. Who is he and where does he belong?

Hold up - what's that just popped through the letterbox? It's an invitation to a party! Also included is a map with "Very Important" written across the top. PI scratches his head feeling puzzled. Who sent it and which other guests will be there?

Driven by curiosity and seeking answers to his questions, he embarks on a voyage through the forbidden land of MATHEMATICS, encountering odd numbers, sharp triangles, perfect circles, turtles, runners, Fibonacci rabbits, bits and bytes, scary agents and what's this? Naked guys in baths?!

What is the probability of passing a vector field and being struck by a butterfly? And who is that guy, showing his tongue, spitting formulas?

Only one thing for it... guide PI through this crazy minefield. At least he has a non periodic laser that may help in some way. All the time, PI's strength is depleting so don't forget to let him eat PIE often!

Will PI have the PARTY of his life? His fate lies in your hands!
